CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Here , we demonstrate for the first time that spirobifluorene can be a very useful building block to construct main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymer , poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)] ( PSFDTBT ) as shown in Scheme 1 , for high efficiency polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Spirobifluorene
2. Poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)] (PSFDTBT)
3. 2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene
4. 5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)

Note that "PSFDTBT" is an abbreviation for the material name, and it is not a separate entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Spirobifluorene
2. Poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)]

I removed the entities that do not clearly refer to the material name, such as "2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene" and "5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)". These entities are components of the material name, but they are not the material names themselves.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Spirobifluorene |
| Poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)] |

I copied the entities from the original paragraph and pasted them into the table, so they are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Here , we demonstrate for the first time that spirobifluorene can be a very useful building block to construct main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymer , poly[2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)] ( PSFDTBT ) as shown in Scheme 1 , for high efficiency polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. "high efficiency" - this describes the performance of the polymer solar cells that can be constructed using spirobifluorene as a building block.
2. "2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene" - this is a structural feature of the polymer backbone, specifically the moiety that is repeated in the main chain of the polymer.
3. "5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)" - this is a structural feature of the polymer backbone, specifically the moiety that is repeated in the main chain of the polymer.
4. "PSFDTBT" - this is the abbreviated name of the polymer, which is a combination of the names of the two repeating units in the polymer backbone.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* High efficiency
* 2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene
* 5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)
* PSFDTBT
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. "high efficiency"
2. "2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene"
3. "5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)"

These three entities refer to the properties of the polymer material being described, specifically its efficiency and structural features.

Here's the updated list of entities:

1. high efficiency
2. 2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene
3. 5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high efficiency |
| 2,7-(3′,6′-dioctyloxy)-9,9′-spirobifluorene |
| 5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-5′,6′-dioctyloxy-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole) |

Note that I've preserved the entities' names as they appear in the original paragraph.
